00030 class Page404 ( rend.Page ):
00031     """
00032     Handles Error 404
00033     
00034     Renders Page not found Error
00035     """
00036     
00037     def render_title ( self, ctx, data ):
00038         "Renders page's title"
00039         request = inevow.IRequest ( ctx )
00040         return "Currently browsing  %s" % ( "/".join(request.prepath[1:]), )
00041 
00042     def render_body ( self, ctx, data ):
00043         "Renders page's body"
00044         return "Not Found"
00045 
00046     docFactory = loaders.stan (
00047         T.html [ T.head [ T.title [ render_title ] ],
00048                  T.body [ render_body ]
00049         ]
00050     ) 
00051 
00052 ##
00053 #    @ingroup browse
00054 #
00055 class RenderEvaluation ( rend.Page ):
00056     """
00057     Handles Evaluations' subpages
00058     
00059     This class renders QSOS evaluation sheets from files located on local 
00060     copy of repository
00061     """
00062     
00063     ##
00064     #    @todo Extract evaluation name from request
00065     #
00066     def render_title ( self, ctx, data ):
00067         "Renders page's title"
00068         return "Title"
00069     
00070     ##
00071     #    @todo
00072     #        A true page's structure!
00073     def render_body ( self, ctx, data ):
00074         "Renders page's body"
00075         [name,version]= inevow.IRequest ( ctx ).path.split("/")[-2:]
00076         document = builder.build(name, version,"..")
00077         return builder.assembleSheet(document,"..")
00078     
00079     docFactory = loaders.stan (
00080         T.html [ T.head [ T.title [ render_title ] ],
00081                  T.body [ render_body ]
00082         ]
00083     )  
00084

00088 class ReportsPage ( rend.Page ):
00089     """Handles unbinded pages
00090     
00091     This class provides a handler for any page's requested not handled"""
00092 
00093     def locateChild ( self, ctx, segments ):
00094         "Generate a 404 Page"
00095         return ( Page404(), () )
00096

00099 #    
00100 class ReportEvaluation ( rend.Page ):
00101     """
00102     Report Evaluation page
00103     
00104     This class locates evaluation page of requested qsos sheet
00105     """
00106     
00107     def locateChild ( self, ctx, segments ):
00108         "Locate and generate the evaluation page"
00109         return ( RenderEvaluation(), () )
00110  
00111 ##
00112 #    @ingroup browse
00113 #   
00114 class SubPage ( rend.Page ):
00115     """
00116     Handles repository subpages
00117     
00118     This class renders a page for any location on the repository that is not
00119     explicitly binded to a handler
00120     """
00121     
00122     def render_title ( self, ctx, data ):
00123         "Renders page's title"
00124         request = inevow.IRequest ( ctx )
00125         return "Currently browsing  %s" % ( "/".join(request.prepath[1:]), )
00126     
00127     def body ( self, ctx, data ):
00128         "Renders page's content"
00129         request = inevow.IRequest ( ctx )
00130         path = "/".join(request.prepath[1:])
00131         body = [ T.h1 [path] ]
00132         body.extend([T.p [ T.a ( href = 'repository/'+path+'/'+dir ) [ dir.split(".")[:-1] ] ] for dir in os.listdir("../sheets/"+path)])
00133         return body
00134     
00135     docFactory = loaders.stan (
00136         T.html [  T.head [ T.title [ render_title ] ], 
00137                   body
00138                  ]
00139         )
00140     
00141   
00142 ##
00143 #    @ingroup browse
00144 #  
00145 class EvaluationPage ( rend.Page ):
00146     """
00147     Renders Evaluation pages content
00148     
00149     This class renders the evaluation home page dynamically from repository's
00150     content.
00151     """
00152     
00153     def render_title ( self, ctx, data ):
00154         "Renders page's title"
00155         request = inevow.IRequest ( ctx )
00156         return "Currently browsing  %s" % ( "/".join(request.prepath[1:]), )
00157     
00158     def body ( self, ctx, data ):
00159         "Renders page's body"
00160         request = inevow.IRequest ( ctx )
00161         path = "/".join(request.prepath[1:])
00162         body = [ T.h1 [path] ]
00163         body.extend([ [ T.p [
00164                              T.a ( href = "/".join(["evaluations",dir,version]) )
00165                              [ dir + "-" + version ]
00166                              ] for version in os.listdir("../sheets/"+path+'/'+dir)]
00167                       for dir in os.listdir("../sheets/"+path)])
00168         return body
00169     
00170     docFactory = loaders.stan (
00171         T.html [  T.head [ T.title [ render_title ] ], 
00172                   body
00173                  ]
00174         )
00175     
00176     def childFactory ( self, ctx, name ):
00177         "Locate and redirect to the evalution sheet requested"
00178         return ReportEvaluation()
00179 
00180 ##
00181 #    @ingroup browse
00182 #
00183 class MainPage ( rend.Page ):
00184     """
00185     Renders repository home page
00186     
00187     This class renders the main page when browse request is handled
00188     """
00189     
00190     body = [ T.h1 ["/"] ]
00191     body.extend([T.p [ T.a ( href = 'repository/'+dir ) [ dir ] ]for dir in os.listdir("../sheets")])
00192     docFactory = loaders.stan (
00193         T.html [ T.head ( title = 'Main Page' ),
00194                  T.body [ body ]
00195                  ]
00196         )
00197     
00198     
00199     def childFactory ( self, ctx, name ):
00200         "Handles children with no explicit renderer"
00201         return SubPage()
00202 
00203     children = { 'evaluations' : EvaluationPage() }
